E. Powley
D. Whitehouse
S. Lucas
P. Cowling
P. Rohlfshagen
S. Tavener

S. Samothrakis
S. Colton
dcterms:description: A comprehensive survey of Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) methods, detailing various algorithms and their applications in computational intelligence and AI in games.
dcterms:title: Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) algorithms

dcterms:creator: S. Bubeck
R. Munos
dcterms:description: A study on open loop optimistic planning, focusing on the theoretical aspects and implications for learning theory.
dcterms:title: Open loop optimistic planning

dcterms:creator: Lucian Busoniu
Rémi Munos
dcterms:description: Research on optimistic planning techniques specifically tailored for Markov decision processes, providing insights into their effectiveness and applications.
dcterms:title: Optimistic planning for Markov decision processes

dcterms:creator: O. Cappé
A. Garivier
O-A. Maillard
R. Munos
G. Stoltz
dcterms:description: A study on Kullback-Leibler upper confidence bounds for optimal sequential allocation, presenting theoretical results and practical implications.
dcterms:title: Kullback-Leibler upper confidence bounds for optimal sequential allocation

dcterms:creator: Zohar Feldman
Carmel Domshlak
dcterms:description: Research on simple regret optimization in online planning for Markov decision processes, focusing on algorithmic approaches and performance metrics.
dcterms:title: Simple Regret Optimization in Online Planning for Markov Decision Processes

dcterms:creator: J.-B. Grill
M. Valko
R. Munos
dcterms:description: A paper discussing sample-efficient Monte-Carlo planning techniques, emphasizing the importance of efficient sampling methods in planning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Blazing the trails before beating the path: Sample-efficient Monte-Carlo planning

dcterms:creator: Jean-Bastien Grill
Omar Darwiche Domingues
Pierre Ménard
Rémi Munos
Michal Valko
dcterms:description: Research on planning in entropy-regularized Markov decision processes and games, exploring the implications of entropy regularization on planning efficiency.
dcterms:title: Planning in entropy-regularized Markov decision processes and games

dcterms:creator: B. Szorenyi
G. Kedenburg
R. Munos
dcterms:description: A study on optimistic planning in Markov decision processes using a generative model, providing insights into the effectiveness of generative models in planning.
dcterms:title: Optimistic Planning in Markov Decision Processes using a generative model
